import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-table', templateUrl: './create-table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-table.component.css'] }) export class CreateTableComponent { @Input() data: any; @Input() value: any; @Input() showDiv:boolean; ngOnInit(){ console.log(this.value, "value") } }
